tasks.title: Setup AWS Infrastructure
tasks.description: Configure AWS resources including S3, DynamoDB, Lambda, and Cognito for the project.
tasks.details: Use AWS CLI or Terraform to set up the necessary infrastructure. Create S3 buckets for input and output data, DynamoDB tables for storing profiles and recommendations, Lambda functions for processing, and Cognito for authentication.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that all AWS resources are correctly configured and accessible. Test by deploying a sample Lambda function and checking connectivity to DynamoDB and S3.

subtasks.title: Create S3 Buckets for Data Storage
subtasks.description: Set up S3 buckets for input and output data storage.
subtasks.details: Use AWS CLI or Terraform to create S3 buckets. Ensure proper naming conventions and permissions are applied.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify bucket creation and access permissions.

subtasks.title: Configure DynamoDB Tables
subtasks.description: Create DynamoDB tables for storing profiles and recommendations.
subtasks.details: Use AWS CLI or Terraform to define and create DynamoDB tables with appropriate keys and attributes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test table creation and data insertion.

subtasks.title: Deploy Lambda Functions
subtasks.description: Set up Lambda functions for data processing tasks.
subtasks.details: Use AWS CLI or Terraform to deploy Lambda functions. Ensure correct IAM roles and environment variables are configured.
subtasks.testStrategy: Deploy a sample function and test execution.

subtasks.title: Set Up Cognito for Authentication
subtasks.description: Configure AWS Cognito for user authentication and management.
subtasks.details: Create a Cognito user pool and configure authentication settings using AWS CLI or Terraform.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test user sign-up and sign-in processes.

subtasks.title: Integrate AWS Services
subtasks.description: Ensure integration between S3, DynamoDB, Lambda, and Cognito.
subtasks.details: Configure permissions and connectivity between AWS services to ensure seamless data flow and processing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test end-to-end data processing and authentication flow.

tasks.title: Create Reference and Synthetic Data Generator
tasks.description: Develop a script to generate synthetic student data and load reference data.
tasks.details: Implement a Python script that uses either an LLM or a template-based generator to create synthetic data. Load reference data from JSON files into the system.
tasks.testStrategy: Run the script to generate data and verify the output format and content. Ensure reference data is correctly loaded and accessible.

subtasks.title: Design Data Generation Strategy
subtasks.description: Outline the approach for generating synthetic student data.
subtasks.details: Decide between using an LLM or a template-based generator. Document the pros and cons of each approach.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review the strategy document for completeness and feasibility.

subtasks.title: Develop Synthetic Data Generator Script
subtasks.description: Implement the script to generate synthetic student data.
subtasks.details: Write a Python script using the chosen strategy to generate realistic student data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run the script to ensure data is generated correctly and matches expected formats.

subtasks.title: Prepare Reference Data Files
subtasks.description: Organize and prepare JSON files for reference data.
subtasks.details: Collect and format reference data into JSON files for easy loading into the system.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the JSON files for correct structure and content.

subtasks.title: Implement Reference Data Loader
subtasks.description: Create a module to load reference data from JSON files.
subtasks.details: Develop a Python module to read and load data from JSON files into the system.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the loader by importing sample JSON files and checking data integrity.

subtasks.title: Integrate and Test Data Generation System
subtasks.description: Combine the synthetic data generator and reference data loader into a cohesive system.
subtasks.details: Ensure both components work together seamlessly and test the entire data generation process.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run end-to-end tests to verify data generation and loading processes.

tasks.title: Implement Data Ingestion Service
tasks.description: Develop a Lambda function to process student text data from S3.
tasks.details: Create a Lambda function that triggers on new S3 uploads, reads JSONL files, and initiates processing for each student.
tasks.testStrategy: Upload a sample JSONL file to S3 and verify that the Lambda function processes it correctly and logs the expected output.

subtasks.title: Set Up S3 Trigger for Lambda
subtasks.description: Configure S3 to trigger the Lambda function on new uploads.
subtasks.details: Create an S3 event notification to trigger the Lambda function when a new JSONL file is uploaded.
subtasks.testStrategy: Upload a test file to S3 and verify the Lambda trigger.

subtasks.title: Develop Lambda Function to Read JSONL Files
subtasks.description: Implement the Lambda function to read JSONL files from S3.
subtasks.details: Write code in the Lambda function to access and read JSONL files from the S3 bucket.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with a sample JSONL file to ensure correct reading.

subtasks.title: Implement Student Data Processing Logic
subtasks.description: Add logic to process each student's data from the JSONL file.
subtasks.details: Develop the processing logic to handle each student's data within the Lambda function.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify processing with sample student data.

subtasks.title: Log Processing Results
subtasks.description: Implement logging for the processing results of each student.
subtasks.details: Use AWS CloudWatch to log the results of each student's data processing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check CloudWatch logs for expected output after processing.

subtasks.title: Test End-to-End Data Ingestion
subtasks.description: Conduct an end-to-end test of the data ingestion service.
subtasks.details: Upload a complete JSONL file and verify the entire ingestion process from trigger to logging.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform an end-to-end test with a full JSONL file and check logs for accuracy.

tasks.title: Develop Vocabulary Profiling Module
tasks.description: Implement the vocabulary profiling system using spaCy.
tasks.details: Create a Python module using spaCy to preprocess text, perform linguistic analysis, and calculate proficiency scores. Functions include `process_text`, `aggregate_stats`, and `calculate_proficiency_score`.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with sample text data to ensure correct profiling and scoring. Validate output against expected vocabulary metrics.

subtasks.title: Set Up spaCy Environment
subtasks.description: Install and configure spaCy for the project.
subtasks.details: Install spaCy and download necessary language models. Ensure the environment is set up for development.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify spaCy installation by running a sample script.

subtasks.title: Implement Text Preprocessing Function
subtasks.description: Develop the `process_text` function to preprocess input text using spaCy.
subtasks.details: Create a function to tokenize text, remove stop words, and perform lemmatization using spaCy.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with sample text to ensure correct preprocessing.

subtasks.title: Develop Linguistic Analysis Function
subtasks.description: Create the `aggregate_stats` function to perform linguistic analysis.
subtasks.details: Implement a function to extract linguistic features such as part-of-speech tags and named entities.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run the function on sample text and verify the extracted features.

subtasks.title: Calculate Proficiency Scores
subtasks.description: Implement the `calculate_proficiency_score` function to assess vocabulary proficiency.
subtasks.details: Develop a scoring algorithm that uses linguistic features to calculate proficiency scores.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate scores against expected metrics using test data.

subtasks.title: Integrate and Test Vocabulary Profiling Module
subtasks.description: Combine all functions into a cohesive module and perform integration testing.
subtasks.details: Ensure all functions work together seamlessly and test the module with comprehensive sample data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct end-to-end testing with diverse text samples to ensure accurate profiling and scoring.

tasks.title: Build Recommendation Engine
tasks.description: Create a module to generate personalized vocabulary recommendations.
tasks.details: Develop a function `generate_recommendations(student_id)` that identifies vocabulary gaps and selects top 10 words based on frequency and context.
tasks.testStrategy: Run the function with sample profiles and verify that recommendations are accurate and relevant.

subtasks.title: Research Recommendation Algorithms
subtasks.description: Investigate algorithms suitable for personalized vocabulary recommendations.
subtasks.details: Explore collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, and hybrid approaches to determine the best fit for vocabulary recommendations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review findings with team to ensure alignment with project goals.

subtasks.title: Design Data Model for Recommendations
subtasks.description: Create a data model to support recommendation generation.
subtasks.details: Define the schema for storing vocabulary data, student profiles, and recommendation results in DynamoDB.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate the data model with sample data to ensure it supports all necessary operations.

subtasks.title: Implement Recommendation Function
subtasks.description: Develop the `generate_recommendations` function to identify vocabulary gaps.
subtasks.details: Write the function to analyze student profiles and select top 10 words based on frequency and context.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run unit tests with mock data to verify the function's accuracy and performance.

subtasks.title: Integrate Recommendation Engine with System
subtasks.description: Connect the recommendation function to the existing system infrastructure.
subtasks.details: Ensure the function can access necessary data from DynamoDB and is callable via AWS Lambda.
subtasks.testStrategy: Deploy the function and test integration by invoking it through a sample API call.

subtasks.title: Validate Recommendations with User Testing
subtasks.description: Conduct user testing to assess the relevance and accuracy of recommendations.
subtasks.details: Gather feedback from a sample group of students and educators to refine the recommendation logic.
subtasks.testStrategy: Collect and analyze feedback to make necessary adjustments to the recommendation algorithm.

tasks.title: Implement Data Storage Layer
tasks.description: Set up DynamoDB tables for storing profiles and recommendations.
tasks.details: Create DynamoDB tables with appropriate schemas for storing student vocabulary profiles and recommendations.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify table creation and test data insertion and retrieval operations.

subtasks.title: Design DynamoDB Table Schemas
subtasks.description: Design the schemas for the DynamoDB tables to store profiles and recommendations.
subtasks.details: Define the attributes and data types for the student vocabulary profiles and recommendations tables.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review schema design with team.

subtasks.title: Create DynamoDB Tables
subtasks.description: Create the DynamoDB tables using the designed schemas.
subtasks.details: Use AWS Console or CLI to create tables with the defined schemas.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify table creation in AWS Console.

subtasks.title: Implement Data Access Layer
subtasks.description: Develop functions to interact with DynamoDB tables for CRUD operations.
subtasks.details: Write functions to insert, update, delete, and retrieve data from the tables.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test CRUD operations with sample data.

subtasks.title: Integrate Data Layer with Application
subtasks.description: Connect the data storage layer with the application logic.
subtasks.details: Ensure the application can call data access functions to store and retrieve data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform integration testing with application workflows.

subtasks.title: Test Data Storage Layer
subtasks.description: Conduct comprehensive testing of the data storage layer.
subtasks.details: Test data insertion, retrieval, and schema compliance with various data sets.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use unit and integration tests to validate data operations.

tasks.title: Integrate Authentication Layer
tasks.description: Implement AWS Cognito for educator login and authentication.
tasks.details: Use AWS Cognito to set up a user pool for single educator login. Implement JWT verification for secure access.
tasks.testStrategy: Test login functionality and JWT verification using sample credentials.

subtasks.title: Set Up AWS Cognito User Pool
subtasks.description: Create a user pool in AWS Cognito for educator authentication.
subtasks.details: Log into AWS, navigate to Cognito, and create a new user pool with necessary attributes for educators.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify user pool creation in AWS console.

subtasks.title: Configure App Client for User Pool
subtasks.description: Set up an app client for the Cognito user pool to enable application access.
subtasks.details: In the Cognito console, create an app client for the user pool and configure settings such as authentication flows.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test app client creation and settings in AWS console.

subtasks.title: Implement JWT Verification
subtasks.description: Develop a mechanism to verify JWT tokens for secure access.
subtasks.details: Use a library like jsonwebtoken to implement JWT verification in the backend service.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test JWT verification with sample tokens.

subtasks.title: Integrate Cognito with Application Backend
subtasks.description: Connect the AWS Cognito user pool with the application backend for authentication.
subtasks.details: Modify backend code to use Cognito for user authentication, ensuring secure login and token management.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test login functionality using sample educator credentials.

subtasks.title: Test Authentication Flow
subtasks.description: Conduct end-to-end testing of the authentication process using AWS Cognito.
subtasks.details: Perform tests to ensure the entire authentication flow works as expected, from login to token verification.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use test accounts to verify login, token issuance, and access control.

tasks.title: Develop Report Generation Module
tasks.description: Create a Lambda function to generate and store student reports in S3.
tasks.details: Implement `generate_reports.py` to compile student data, validate with schema, and write reports to S3.
tasks.testStrategy: Generate reports from sample data and verify schema compliance and correct storage in S3.

subtasks.title: Set Up Lambda Function Environment
subtasks.description: Configure the AWS Lambda environment for the report generation module.
subtasks.details: Create a new Lambda function in AWS. Set up necessary IAM roles and permissions for S3 access.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify Lambda function can be triggered manually.

subtasks.title: Implement Data Compilation Logic
subtasks.description: Develop logic to compile student data for report generation.
subtasks.details: Write code in `generate_reports.py` to fetch and compile student data from the database.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with sample data to ensure correct data compilation.

subtasks.title: Validate Data Against Schema
subtasks.description: Implement schema validation for compiled student data.
subtasks.details: Use a JSON schema validator to ensure data complies with the defined schema before report generation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with invalid data to ensure validation errors are raised.

subtasks.title: Generate and Format Reports
subtasks.description: Create the logic to generate and format student reports.
subtasks.details: Develop functions to format compiled data into a structured report format (e.g., PDF or JSON).
subtasks.testStrategy: Generate reports from sample data and verify formatting.

subtasks.title: Store Reports in S3
subtasks.description: Implement functionality to store generated reports in S3.
subtasks.details: Write code to upload the generated reports to a specified S3 bucket with appropriate metadata.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify reports are correctly stored in S3 and accessible.

tasks.title: Setup Step Function Orchestration
tasks.description: Configure AWS Step Functions to manage the processing workflow.
tasks.details: Define a Step Function workflow that orchestrates Lambda executions for data processing, profiling, and recommendations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the workflow with a complete data set to ensure correct execution order and error handling.

subtasks.title: Define Workflow States
subtasks.description: Identify and define the states for the Step Function workflow.
subtasks.details: List all necessary states such as data ingestion, profiling, and recommendation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review state definitions with the team.

subtasks.title: Configure State Transitions
subtasks.description: Set up transitions between workflow states in AWS Step Functions.
subtasks.details: Use the AWS Step Functions console to configure transitions between defined states.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure transitions align with the workflow logic.

subtasks.title: Integrate Lambda Functions
subtasks.description: Link Lambda functions to the corresponding states in the workflow.
subtasks.details: Attach existing Lambda functions for data processing, profiling, and recommendations to the workflow states.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test each state to ensure the correct Lambda function is triggered.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Handling
subtasks.description: Add error handling and retry logic to the workflow.
subtasks.details: Define error states and retry policies for each state to handle failures gracefully.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate errors and verify that the workflow handles them as expected.

subtasks.title: Test Complete Workflow
subtasks.description: Run end-to-end tests on the Step Function workflow with a full data set.
subtasks.details: Execute the workflow with sample data to validate execution order and error handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use a complete data set to ensure the workflow executes correctly and handles errors.

tasks.title: Optimize Lambda Performance
tasks.description: Enhance Lambda functions for efficient execution and resource usage.
tasks.details: Preload spaCy models and reference data in Lambda layers to reduce cold start times. Optimize memory and timeout settings.
tasks.testStrategy: Measure execution times and resource usage before and after optimization.

subtasks.title: Analyze Current Lambda Performance
subtasks.description: Evaluate the current performance of Lambda functions.
subtasks.details: Collect metrics on execution time, memory usage, and cold start latency for existing Lambda functions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use AWS CloudWatch to gather and analyze performance metrics.

subtasks.title: Preload spaCy Models in Lambda Layers
subtasks.description: Load spaCy models into Lambda layers to reduce cold start times.
subtasks.details: Create a Lambda layer containing spaCy models and configure Lambda functions to use this layer.
subtasks.testStrategy: Deploy a test Lambda function using the layer and measure cold start times.

subtasks.title: Optimize Memory and Timeout Settings
subtasks.description: Adjust memory and timeout settings for optimal performance.
subtasks.details: Analyze performance data to determine optimal memory and timeout settings for each Lambda function.
subtasks.testStrategy: Modify settings and compare performance metrics before and after changes.

subtasks.title: Implement Reference Data Caching
subtasks.description: Cache reference data in Lambda layers to improve execution efficiency.
subtasks.details: Add reference data to Lambda layers and ensure functions access this data efficiently.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test Lambda functions to ensure they correctly access cached data and measure performance improvements.

subtasks.title: Validate Optimized Lambda Performance
subtasks.description: Ensure optimized Lambda functions meet performance goals.
subtasks.details: Conduct comprehensive testing to validate that Lambda functions are optimized for execution time and resource usage.
subtasks.testStrategy: Compare execution times and resource usage against initial metrics to confirm improvements.

tasks.title: Implement Schema Validation
tasks.description: Use pydantic to enforce input and output schema validation.
tasks.details: Define pydantic models for input and output data formats. Integrate validation checks in processing functions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with valid and invalid data to ensure schema enforcement and error handling.

subtasks.title: Define Input Data Model
subtasks.description: Create a Pydantic model for input data validation.
subtasks.details: Design a Pydantic model to validate the structure and types of input data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with various input data to ensure validation.

subtasks.title: Define Output Data Model
subtasks.description: Create a Pydantic model for output data validation.
subtasks.details: Design a Pydantic model to validate the structure and types of output data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with various output data to ensure validation.

subtasks.title: Integrate Input Validation
subtasks.description: Integrate input data validation into processing functions.
subtasks.details: Modify processing functions to use the input Pydantic model for validation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test processing functions with valid and invalid input data.

subtasks.title: Integrate Output Validation
subtasks.description: Integrate output data validation into processing functions.
subtasks.details: Modify processing functions to use the output Pydantic model for validation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test processing functions to ensure output data conforms to the model.

subtasks.title: Implement Error Handling
subtasks.description: Implement error handling for validation failures.
subtasks.details: Add error handling logic to manage validation exceptions and provide meaningful error messages.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test error handling by providing invalid data and checking error messages.

tasks.title: Conduct End-to-End Testing
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive testing of the entire system with synthetic data.
tasks.details: Run the complete pipeline with synthetic data to validate functionality, performance, and integration.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that all components work together seamlessly and meet performance targets.

subtasks.title: Set Up Testing Environment
subtasks.description: Prepare the environment for end-to-end testing with synthetic data.
subtasks.details: Configure the testing environment to mirror production settings and ensure all necessary components are available.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify environment setup by running a basic test case.

subtasks.title: Generate Synthetic Data
subtasks.description: Create synthetic data for testing purposes.
subtasks.details: Develop scripts to generate synthetic data that mimics real-world scenarios for comprehensive testing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate synthetic data by comparing it with expected patterns and structures.

subtasks.title: Execute End-to-End Test Cases
subtasks.description: Run end-to-end test cases using the synthetic data.
subtasks.details: Develop and execute test cases that cover all system functionalities and integrations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure all test cases pass and document any failures for further analysis.

subtasks.title: Analyze Test Results
subtasks.description: Review and analyze the results from the end-to-end tests.
subtasks.details: Collect and analyze test results to identify any issues or performance bottlenecks.
subtasks.testStrategy: Generate a report summarizing test outcomes and any identified issues.

subtasks.title: Optimize System Based on Findings
subtasks.description: Make necessary adjustments based on test results.
subtasks.details: Implement changes to address any issues found during testing and improve system performance.
subtasks.testStrategy: Re-run critical test cases to confirm that optimizations have resolved identified issues.

tasks.title: Deploy and Monitor System
tasks.description: Deploy the system to AWS and set up monitoring and logging.
tasks.details: Deploy all components to AWS and configure CloudWatch for logging and monitoring. Set up alerts for failures or performance issues.
tasks.testStrategy: Monitor system during test runs and adjust configurations based on observed metrics.

subtasks.title: Set Up AWS Environment
subtasks.description: Create and configure AWS environment for deployment.
subtasks.details: Provision necessary AWS resources such as EC2, RDS, and S3.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify resource availability and access.

subtasks.title: Deploy Application Components
subtasks.description: Deploy all system components to the AWS environment.
subtasks.details: Use AWS CLI or management console to deploy application components.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure all components are running and accessible.

subtasks.title: Configure CloudWatch Logging
subtasks.description: Set up CloudWatch for application logging.
subtasks.details: Create log groups and configure application to send logs to CloudWatch.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check CloudWatch for incoming logs and verify log integrity.

subtasks.title: Set Up CloudWatch Monitoring
subtasks.description: Configure CloudWatch to monitor system performance.
subtasks.details: Define metrics and create dashboards to monitor system health.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify dashboards display correct metrics and update in real-time.

subtasks.title: Implement Alerting for Failures
subtasks.description: Set up alerts for system failures or performance issues.
subtasks.details: Create CloudWatch alarms and SNS topics for alert notifications.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test alerts by simulating failures and ensure notifications are received.

tasks.title: Document System and User Guide
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for system setup and usage.
tasks.details: Write detailed documentation covering system architecture, setup instructions, and user guides for educators.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for completeness and clarity. Ensure it covers all necessary aspects for deployment and use.

subtasks.title: Draft System Architecture Documentation
subtasks.description: Create a detailed document outlining the system architecture.
subtasks.details: Include diagrams and descriptions of each component and their interactions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review for technical accuracy and completeness.

subtasks.title: Write Setup Instructions
subtasks.description: Develop step-by-step setup instructions for the system.
subtasks.details: Cover installation, configuration, and initial deployment steps.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test by following instructions on a clean environment.

subtasks.title: Create User Guide for Educators
subtasks.description: Write a user guide tailored for educators using the system.
subtasks.details: Include usage scenarios, common tasks, and troubleshooting tips.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing with educators to ensure clarity.

subtasks.title: Compile Documentation into a Single Guide
subtasks.description: Combine all sections into a cohesive document.
subtasks.details: Ensure consistent formatting and style across all sections.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review for consistency and completeness.

subtasks.title: Review and Finalize Documentation
subtasks.description: Conduct a final review and make necessary revisions.
subtasks.details: Get feedback from stakeholders and incorporate changes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure all feedback is addressed and document is ready for release.

tasks.title: Prepare for Future Enhancements
tasks.description: Plan and document potential future features and improvements.
tasks.details: Identify and document potential enhancements such as a web dashboard, REST API, and gamified vocabulary practice.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure documentation aligns with current system capabilities and outlines clear paths for future development.

subtasks.title: Research Potential Enhancements
subtasks.description: Conduct research on potential enhancements like a web dashboard, REST API, and gamified vocabulary practice.
subtasks.details: Gather information on current trends and technologies related to web dashboards, REST APIs, and gamification. Document findings for future reference.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review research for completeness and relevance.

subtasks.title: Draft Enhancement Specifications
subtasks.description: Create draft specifications for each potential enhancement.
subtasks.details: Based on research, draft detailed specifications for a web dashboard, REST API, and gamified vocabulary practice. Include feature descriptions and technical requirements.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure specifications are clear and align with research findings.

subtasks.title: Evaluate System Compatibility
subtasks.description: Assess current system capabilities to support proposed enhancements.
subtasks.details: Review existing system architecture and identify areas that need modification to support new features. Document compatibility issues and potential solutions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the evaluation covers all system components and identifies necessary changes.

subtasks.title: Create Enhancement Roadmap
subtasks.description: Develop a roadmap outlining the implementation phases for each enhancement.
subtasks.details: Organize enhancements into a phased roadmap. Prioritize based on impact, feasibility, and dependencies. Include timelines and resource requirements.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check roadmap for logical sequencing and feasibility.

subtasks.title: Document Enhancement Plans
subtasks.description: Compile all research, specifications, and roadmaps into a comprehensive document.
subtasks.details: Create a detailed document that includes research findings, specifications, system evaluations, and the enhancement roadmap. Ensure clarity and accessibility for stakeholders.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review document for completeness and clarity. Ensure it aligns with current system capabilities and future goals.
